long_description: The Burton Mint snowboard boots focus on great performance without the high price. The Mint are the best-selling women's boots from Burton. Streamlined Speed Zone(TM) shell lacing system lets you fine-tune the fit quickly and easily; personalize the upper and lower zones in a matter of seconds. Mint boots feature Imprint 1 EVA liners with long-lasting power panels wrapping feet in comfort; they'll conform to your feet after several days of riding for ultimate comfort. Soft flexing, slim 3D-molded tongues wrap the forefeet in comfort, offer a seamless flex and reduce performance-robbing shell/liner stack-up. Grip Fit backstays mate with binding grip zones to secure a locked-and-loaded response. Snowproof internal gussets on boot tongues completely seal lower boot zones to keep feet warm and dry. Durable 2-part outsoles feature EVA cushion in heels and rubber ice spikes for incredible traction on slippery surfaces. Women-specific True Fit(TM) Design creates boots and bindings specifically for the way a woman rides, ensuring complete control, total power and ultimate fun.
short_description: The Burton Mint snowboard boots focus on great performance without the high price. The Mint are the best-selling women's boots from Burton.
